meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gastight.
meanings.sent1: The gastightnesses of the container ensured no gas could escape.
meanings.sent2: The gastightnesses of the windows kept the room warm in winter.
meanings.sent3: The balloon's gastightnesses made it the perfect choice for the helium experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her argument had the gastightnesses of a sealed vault, leaving no room for doubt.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut's suit had to have impeccable gastightnesses to protect against the vacuum of space.

meanings.definition: The ability to prevent the passage of gas.
meanings.sent1: The gastightnesses of the seal kept the food fresh for days.
meanings.sent2: The gastightnesses of the tire prevented any air from leaking out.
meanings.sent3: The gastightnesses of the balloon animal amazed the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: The gastightnesses of the submarine allowed it to dive deep into the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The gastightnesses of the mask protected the wearer from inhaling harmful fumes.
